Columns.Description: Date and time when the report was generated (UTC)
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: The ARM path of the session host
Columns.Name: SessionHostResourceId

Columns.Description: The version of the WVD Agent running on the Virtual Machine
Columns.Name: AgentVersion

Columns.Description: The version of the operating system
Columns.Name: OSVersion

Columns.Description: The version of the reverse connect listener running on the VM
Columns.Name: SxSStackVersion

Columns.Description: The time recorded when there was a change in the health status
Columns.Name: LastHeartBeat

Columns.Description: The current state of the VM, whether its available or offline
Columns.Name: EndpointState

Columns.Description: The last known state from a previous update
Columns.Name: UpgradeState

Columns.Description: The version of the reverse connect listener running on the VM
Columns.Name: UpgradeErrorMsg

Columns.Description: The time recorded when there was a change in the health status
Columns.Name: LastUpgradeTimeStamp

Columns.Description: The set of results on health checks
Columns.Name: SessionHostHealthCheckResult

Columns.Description: The number of active sessions on the VM
Columns.Name: ActiveSessions

Columns.Description: The number of disconnected, or logged off sessions on the VM
Columns.Name: InactiveSessions

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
